title: Yankee, Go Home
description: Explore the grittier side of the South through the eyes of a Yankee. Get lost in Arkansas and chased through Alabama by a badman. Discover who really won the Civil War and why. Encounter the Ku Klux Klan through the eyes of two Yankee bikers. Meet up with a Southern cop under the rolling eyes of The Big Chicken.Get answers to the most burning questions:Does it snow down South? Are bugs really bigger in the South? How should you say hello? What Southern delicacy is generally unmentionable?What happens when a Yankee faces off with her Southern counterparts? Find out in this mostly true tale of life in the South for a Yankee girl in the 1970s and 1980s.
author: Sharon Delarose
